GapFillDragDrop.Title: The Title
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Listen to the video of people talking about times in different countries and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
P: Where’s the waiter? We ’d like to order, please.
W: Oh, right. Of course. Okay … what would you like?
A: I’d like the salmon, please.
P: And I’d like the steak, please.
W: Right. Just a minute. Sorry. What would you like?
A: I’d like the salmon …
P: And I’d like the steak, please.
W: One salmon, one steak. Would you like anything to drink?
P: Just some water, please.
W: Water. Still or sparkling?
P: Still A: Sparkling
P: One bottle of still water, one bottle of sparkling water.
W: Right. So that’s …
W: Would you like anything else? Any coffee?
P: No thank you. Can we have the bill please?
W: Yes, of course.
W: Here you are. Service not included.
P: Yes, I know. Thank you very much.
W: Thank you very much.
